CodeBlockMethod.Name: setNextTarget
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
if #self.insideMonster > 0 then
self.currentTarget = self.insideMonster[1]
if self.currentTarget == nil then table.remove(self.insideMonster,1) self:setNextTarget() elseif self.canAttack and self.currentTarget ~=nil then self:AttackTarget() end else self.currentTarget = nil end --공격하려던 타겟이 맞아서 사라졌을경우 타겟테이블에서 지워야함

CodeBlockMethod.Name: AttackTarget
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if isvalid(self.currentTarget) and self.canAttack then self.canAttack = false --스폰한다 타이머 설정해서 --공격모션실행과 온힛부르기? self:attackAnimation() if isvalid(self.currentTarget) then self:hitOnMonster(self.currentTarget) end --펑션으로 함수만들어서 canattack값바꿔주고 범위내에 있으면 공격다시하게 설정 local repeatAttack = function() self.canAttack = true if isvalid(self.currentTarget) then self:AttackTarget() else self:setNextTarget() end end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(repeatAttack,self.repeatDelay) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: attackAnimation
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local body = self.Entity.AvatarRendererComponent:GetBodyEntity() local event = ActionStateChangedEvent(self.attackStance,self.attackStance,1,SpriteAnimClipPlayType.Onetime,1,2) body:SendEvent(event) --공격모션 재생하기 ! local position = self.Entity.TransformComponent.Position --오프셋으로 해서 파라미터설정해야할지도 _EffectService:PlayEffect(self.attackEffectId,self.Entity,position,0,Vector3.one,false)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: hitOnMonster
CodeBlockMethod.Code: Target.HitComponent:OnHit(self.Entity,self.Damage,false,"",1) if isvalid(Target) == false then return end local targetPos = Target.TransformComponent.Position _EffectService:PlayEffect(self.HitEffectAt,Target,targetPos,0,Vector3.one,false)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
HandleTriggerLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
--------------- Native Event Sender Info ---------------- -- Sender: TriggerComponent -- Space: Server, Client ---------------------------------------------------------
-- Parameters -- local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity --------------------------------------------------------- local target = event.TriggerBodyEntity
if self:IsClient() then return end
for i, monster in pairs(self.insideMonster) do if monster == target then table.remove(self.insideMonster, i)
break end end if self.currentTarget == target then --다음타겟설정 self:setNextTarget() end
